articles.description: In a recent development, Saurabh Vatsa, the Brand Head of Citroen India, has tendered his resignation. This news comes just two years after Vatsa's elevation to the role of Brand Head at Citroen in India.
articles.content:
Before his tenure at Citroen, Vatsa held positions at renowned companies such as General Motors and Daewoo.

articles.author: Vandana Ramnani
articles.title: Nearly 60% homebuyers prefer mid-range & premium homes despite price hike: ANAROCK survey - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The survey found that homes priced Rs 45 to 90 lakh are most favoured by 35 percent of the homebuyers, while 24 percent prefer homes in the range of Rs 90 lakh to Rs 1.5 crore
articles.content: Demand for mid-range and premium homes remains high with 59 percent of homebuyers favouring units in the range of Rs 45 lakh to Rs 1.5 crore, the ANAROCK Consumer Sentiment Survey (H1 2023) has shown… [+3799 chars]
